SELECT p.name,h.host_name, min_photo_num2(hp.host_num) host_photo, r.room_name, res.*,(TO_DATE(res.res_end) - TO_DATE(res.res_start)) nday, substr(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(res.res_start),'YYYY.MM.DD') || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(res.res_start),'DY'),6) sday, substr(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(res.res_end),'YYYY.MM.DD') || ' ' ||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(res.res_end),'DY'),6) eday
FROM profile p join res res on p.mem_num = res.mem_num join host h on res.host_num = h.host_num join room r on res.room_num = r.room_num join hostphoto hp on h.host_num = hp.host_num AND hp.host_photo_num = ( SELECT MIN(host_photo_num) FROM hostphoto WHERE host_num = hp.host_num )
AND res.res_status = 1 AND p.mem_num = #{mem_num} order by res_start
